fields.title: Scouter Name
fields.description: Enter the name of the scouter.

fields.title: Team of Scouter
fields.description: Enter the team of the scouter.

fields.title: Type of Match
fields.description: The type of match it is.

fields.title: Match Number
fields.description: Enter the match number.

fields.title: Driver Station
fields.description: The robot you are scouting this match, based on driver station position.

fields.title: Team Number
fields.description: The team number of the robot you're scouting.

fields.title: No Show
fields.description: Check if the robot did not show up for the match.

fields.title: Pre-Loaded Popcorn
fields.description: Check if the robot is preloaded with Popcorn.

fields.title: Pre-Loaded Butter
fields.description: Check if the robot is preloaded with Butter.

fields.title: Leave the Starting Zone?
fields.description: Check if the robot is no longer on the starting Zone.

fields.title: Popcorn Pick Up | HP Station (Auto)
fields.description: Number of Popcorn picked up from the HP Station.

fields.title: Popcorn Scored
fields.description: The number of Popcorn scored in the Popper during autonomous.

fields.title: Popcorn Missed
fields.description: The number of Popcorn attempted to be scored but missed.

fields.title: Butter Placed in Melter (Auto)
fields.description: The number of Butt placed in Melter during Autonomous.

fields.title: Butter Missed (Auto)
fields.description: The number of Missed during Autonomous.

fields.title: Butter received from HP station (Auto)
fields.description: The number of Butter recieved from the HP station during Autonomous.

fields.title: Butter Picked Off Floor (Auto)
fields.description: The number of Butter Picked Up from the floor during Autonomous.

fields.title: Popcorn Pick Up | Human Player Station (Tele)
fields.description: Did the team pick up Popcorn from the Human Player Station(s)?

fields.title: Popcorn Pick Up | Floor (Tele)
fields.description: Did the team pick up Popcorn from the floor?

fields.title: Popcorn Scored
fields.description: The number of Popcorn scored in the Popper during Tele-op.

fields.title: Popcorn Missed (Tele)
fields.description: The number of Popcorn attempted to be scored but missed.

fields.title: Butter Placed in Melter (Tele)
fields.description: The number of Butter placed in Melter during TeleOp.

fields.title: Butter Missed (Tele)
fields.description: The number of Butter Missed during TeleOp.

fields.title: Butter recieved from HP station (Tele)
fields.description: The number of Butter recieved from HP station during TeleOp.

fields.title: Butter Picked Up from Floor (Tele)
fields.description: The number of Butter picked up from the floor during TeleOp.

fields.title: End Position
fields.description: What is the position of the robt at the end of the match?

fields.title: Defense Skill
fields.description: -10: Actively detrimental (many penalties) ---------------------------------------- 0: Neither beneficial nor harmful ----------------------------------------------------- 10: Minorly disrupts multiple robots/moderately hampers one robot ------- 20: Moderately disrupts multiple robots/severely hampers one robot ------ 30: Severely disrupts multiple robots/entirely shuts down one robot

fields.title: Played Defence
fields.description: Did the Robot Play defence? the previous question will be ignored if this is off (red)

fields.title: Major Mechanism Broke
fields.description: Did one of the robot's major mechanism break?

fields.title: Version ID
fields.description: To check which version of the form this is.
